option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Use Node.js LTS version FROM node:18-alpine
# Set working directory WORKDIR /app
# Copy package files COPY package*.json ./ COPY backend/package*.json ./backend/
# Install dependencies RUN npm install RUN cd backend && npm install
# Copy source code COPY . .
# Expose port EXPOSE 5000
# Set environment to production ENV NODE_ENV=production
# Start the server CMD ["node", "backend/server.js"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Development Environment Variables NODE_ENV=development PORT=5000
# Database MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/travelling_website
# JWT Secret (Change this in production!) JWT_SECRET=your_super_secret_jwt_key_change_in_production_please
# Client URL CLIENT_URL=http://localhost:3000
# Email Configuration (Gmail example) EMAIL_HOST=smtp.gmail.com EMAIL_PORT=587 EMAIL_USER=your_email@gmail.com EMAIL_PASS=your_gmail_app_password
# Payment Gateway - Stripe (Get from https://stripe.com) STRIPE_SECRET_KEY=sk_test_your_stripe_secret_key_here STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=pk_test_your_stripe_publishable_key_here STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET=whsec_your_webhook_secret
# Vietnamese Payment Gateway (Get from VNPay) VNPAY_TMN_CODE=your_vnpay_tmn_code VNPAY_SECRET_KEY=your_vnpay_secret_key
# File Upload Configuration MAX_FILE_SIZE=10485760 UPLOAD_PATH=./uploads
# Admin Configuration ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@travelcompany.com COMPANY_NAME=TravelCo COMPANY_PHONE=+84-123-456-789 COMPANY_ADDRESS=123 Travel Street, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value: import React, {JSX} from 'react'; import * as FeatherIcons from 'react-icons/fi'; FiSettings: FeatherIcons.FiSettings, FiEdit3: FeatherIcons.FiEdit3, FiSave: FeatherIcons.FiSave, FiCheck: FeatherIcons.FiCheck, FiCamera: FeatherIcons.FiCamera, FiPlay: FeatherIcons.FiPlay, FiArrowRight: FeatherIcons.FiArrowRight, FiCreditCard: FeatherIcons.FiCreditCard, FiDownload: FeatherIcons.FiDownload, FiBarChart: FeatherIcons.FiBarChart, FiFacebook: FeatherIcons.FiFacebook, return <IconComponent className={className} onClick={onClick} size={size} />;

originalContent
option.value:
compatibility_date = "2024-08-15"
[build] command = "cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build" publish = "frontend/build"
[build.environment] REACT_APP_API_URL = "https://your-backend.vercel.app/api" REACT_APP_STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY = ""
[[redirects]] from = "/*" to = "/index.html" status = 200
[compatibility_flags] nodejs_compat = true

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
compatibility_date = "2024-08-15" compatibility_flags = ["nodejs_compat"]
[build] command = "cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build"
[env.production.vars] REACT_APP_API_URL = "https://your-backend.vercel.app/api" REACT_APP_STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY = ""
[[routes]] pattern = "/*" custom_domain = true
